description:
The fifth season of Date A Live.

Shidou Itsuka faces greater peril than ever due to his continued involvement with Ratatoskr. He has already sealed 10 Spirits, and Isaac Westcott, leader of Deus Ex Machina Industries, has finally decided to kill Shidou and plunder the Spirits' powers for himself.

To achieve his goal, Isaac declares an all-out war against Ratatoskr, forcing the organization to exhaust its resources to ensure Shidou's survival. Despite being severely outnumbered and outmatched, a glimmer of hope exists in the form of the Spirit of Time, Kurumi Tokisaki. Shidou must seal and acquire Kurumi's power to travel to the past and confront the Spirit of Origin—the catalyst that started it all.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: พิชิตรัก พิทักษ์โลก ภาค 5

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/志茂文彦) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fumihiko_Shimo)

Noted for writing the scripts for Kyoto Animation's anime adaptations of Key visual novels.

Began his career as a production assistant on [Grave of the Fireflies](https://anilist.co/anime/578/), but switched to writing right after.

sweet ARMS is voice actress unit composed by [Iori Nomizu](https://anilist.co/staff/103956/Iori-Nomizu), [Misuzu Togashi](https://anilist.co/staff/103806/Misuzu-Togashi), [Kaori Sadohara](https://anilist.co/staff/107284/Kaori-Sadohara), and [Misato](https://anilist.co/staff/107759/Misato).

[Profile](http://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/tomita_miyu/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/miyu-tomita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyju_tomita) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tomita__miyu._/)

The Grand Prix winner of the 2014 Seiyuu Artist Training Program Selection competition, which was sponsored by Amuse and Ken Production. After being scouted by six talent agencies, she eventually joined Amuse.

She made her voice acting debut in 2015, voicing a number of unnamed characters in Himouto Umaru-chan.

Non-Anime Roles
• Layla - Genshin Impact (VG)
• Zara - Memento Mori (VG)
• New Jersey - Azur Lane (VG)
• Jiu Niangzi - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

[Website](https://www.mattgreenbaumvo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mattsgreenbaum) 

American voice actor and ADR writer.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/fabioreallyfast/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/FabioCamposDub) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fabio.campos.3511)

Fábio Campos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director and musician.

As dubbing director, he has worked at DuBrasil since 2014, and is also a professor in the studio's dubbing course. He also works as a musician, being a bassist in the group Speed ​​Bullets Trio.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Takeda Takahashi (Mortal Kombat X)
- José Manuel Esquivel "Chema" (Grachi)
- Marlon (The Walking Dead: The Final Season)
- Saber (Mobile Legends: Bang Bang)
- Agent Ned Ross (NCIS: Hawai'i)
- Peter Porker / Spider-Ham and Two-Gun Kid (LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2)
- El Chavo del Ocho (El Chavo video game)
- Joshua "Josh" Wilson / White Josh (Crazy Ex-Girlfriend)
!~

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lulihorta) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lulihorta)

Luísa Horta is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Kirra Foster / Skye (Valorant)
- Female Protagonist (Tower of Fantasy)
- Savannah Miller (The Circle EUA)
- Mary Anne (2nd dub; The Baby-Sitters Club)
- Kira Yukimura (Sony's dub; Teen Wolf)
- Alicia (Stuck 2017)
- Liz Cheney (Vice)
- Oh Hui-Ji (A Love So Beautiful)
!~
